amendment.description: Page 572, after line 23, add the following: SEC. 9122. PREVENTING THE ARRIVAL IN THE UNITED STATES OF FOREST PESTS THROUGH RESTRICTIONS ON THE IMPORTATION OF CERTAIN PLANTS FOR PLANTING. (a) Criteria for Adding Plants to Not Authorized Pending Pest Risk Analysis List- Section 412(a) of the Plant Protection Act (7 U.S.C. 7711(a)) is amended-- ***.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 23 printed in House Report 115-679 to improve cooperation with the Forest Service to intercept tree and wood pests and would require a report on the interception of forest pests.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Faso amendment (A041) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A041) offered by Mr. Faso.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Faso amendment (A041) Agreed to by voice vote.
